thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: CHRIS
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by CHRIS

author: CHRIS
title: CHRIS
text: When arriving to pick up a car found out agent had pick up at different terminal as visitors & not knowing region the friendly staff arranged transport to right terminal so we got our car no problems. I like to give them a BIG thank you for caring. Would definitely use Redspot again and recommend them to all. Specially the staff at Perth Domestic Airport.
